member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.NumericEditNullBehavior.AllowNull
member.summary: The Value property in a NumericEdit control can be set to null (Nothing in Visual Basic). If the user enters an empty string in the control it will be considered as null.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.NumericEditNullBehavior.NoNulls
member.summary: The Value property in a NumericEdit control can not be null not DBNull.Value. If the user enters an empty string in the control it will be considered as 0.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.NumericEditFormatMask.Currency

member.summary: Cells are drawn manually. When a cell that belongs to the column with this setting needs to be drawn, the DrawGridArea event will be raised.

member.summary: Cells in the new row are drawn manually. When a new row cell that belongs to the column with this setting needs to be drawn, the DrawGridArea event will be raised.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ColumnOwnerDrawnMode.CardCell
member.summary: Cells in card view are drawn manually. When a card cell that belongs to the column with this setting needs to be drawn, the DrawGridArea event will be raised.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ColumnOwnerDrawnMode.GroupTotalCell
member.summary: Cells in group total rows are drawn manually. When a group total row cell that belongs to the column with this setting needs to be drawn, the DrawGridArea event will be raised.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ColumnOwnerDrawnMode.TotalRowCell
member.summary: Cells in table total rows are drawn manually. When a total row cell that belongs to the column with this setting needs to be drawn, the DrawGridArea event will be raised.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ColumnOwnerDrawnMode.CardHeader
member.summary: Headers in card view are drawn manually. When a card view header that belongs to the column with this setting needs to be drawn, the DrawGridArea event will be raised.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ColumnOwnerDrawnMode.ColumnHeader
member.summary: Column headers are drawn manually. When a header that belongs to the column with this setting needs to be drawn, the DrawGridArea event will be raised.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ColumnOwnerDrawnMode.FilterRowCell
member.summary: Cells in the filter row are drawn manually. When a filter row cell that belongs to the column with this setting needs to be drawn, the DrawGridArea event will be raised.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ColumnOwnerDrawnMode.All
member.summary: All the areas that belong to the column are drawn manually.

member.summary: The behavior of the control is defined by the EnterKeyBehavior property.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.NewRowEnterKeyBehavior.AddRowAndStayInCurrentCell
member.summary: When the user presses enter, the control will add the new row and the selected cell will remain the same.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.NewRowEnterKeyBehavior.AddRowAndMoveToFirstCellInNewRow
member.summary: When the user presses enter, the control will add the new row and the first cell in the new row will be selected after that to start adding another row.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.NewRowEnterKeyBehavior.AddRowAndMoveToAddedRow
member.summary: When the user presses enter, the control will add the new row and the row just added will be selected to let the user continue editing the row.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.NewRowEnterKeyBehavior.None
member.summary: When the user presses enter, the enter key will be ignored.

member.summary: The column is printed only when it is visible.

member.summary: The column is printed always, even if its Visible property is false.

member.summary: SortOrder of Group changes

member.summary: The column or control displays a button with a down-pointing arrow aligned to the right.

member.summary: Displays button only when the cell is in edit mode.

member.summary: Displays button only in the current cell.

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ColumnType
member.summary: Specifies how column contents will be displayed.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ColumnType.Text
member.summary: Cells that belong to a column with this setting will display only text.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ColumnType.Image
member.summary: Cells that belong to a column with this setting will display only an image from the Imagelist.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ColumnType.ImageAndText
member.summary: Cells that belong to a column with this setting will display an image from the Imagelist and text.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ColumnType.CheckBox
member.summary: Cells that belong to a column with this setting will appear as an embedded check box.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ColumnType.BoundImage
member.summary: Cells that belong to a column with this setting will display an image retrieved from the data source.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ColumnType.Link
member.summary: Cells that belong to a column with this setting will appear as a link label.

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.GridEX.GroupInterval
member.summary: Specifies how cell values are grouped.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.GroupInterval.Default
member.summary: Groups are calculated using the option specified in the DefaultGroupInterval property of the column grouped.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.GroupInterval.Value
member.summary: Groups are calculated using the values of the cell.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.GroupInterval.Text
member.summary: Groups are calculated using the text of a cell. This setting is specially useful when grouping columns with ValueList or DropDowns that replace Id values for a text associated to it.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.GroupInterval.Alphabetical
member.summary: Groups are calculated using only the first character of the text of a cell.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.GroupInterval.Date
member.summary: Groups are calculated using only the date portion of a DateTime value. The time portion is ignored.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.GroupInterval.Month
member.summary: Groups are calculated using only the month and year portions of a DateTime value. The day and time portions are ignored.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.GroupInterval.Quarter
member.summary: Groups are calculated based using the quarter and year that a DateTime value belongs.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.GroupInterval.Year
member.summary: Groups are calculated using only the year of a DateTime value. The month, day and time portions are ignored.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.GroupInterval.Hour
member.summary: Groups are calculated using the date and the hour of a DateTime value. minutes and seconds are ignored.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.GroupInterval.Minute
member.summary: Groups are calculated using the date, the hours and the minutes of a DateTime value. seconds are ignored.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.GroupInterval.Second
member.summary: Groups are calculated using the date, the hours, the minutes and the second of a DateTime value.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.GroupInterval.OutlookDates
member.summary: Groups are calculated in date periods based on the current date on the system like in Outlook 2003.

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.GridEX.EditType
member.summary: Specifies how columns are edited.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.EditType.NoEdit
member.summary: The column can not be edited by the user.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.EditType.TextBox
member.summary: The column is edited using a text box control.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.EditType.CalendarDropDown
member.summary: The column is edited using a drop-down calendar. Users can select a date from the drop-down calendar to edit a cell.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.EditType.CalendarCombo
member.summary: The column is edited using a texbox and a drop-down calendar. Users can type a date or select it from the drop-down calendar.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.EditType.Combo
member.summary: The column is edited using a combo box control. The source of the drop-down list is a ValueList.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.EditType.DropDownList
member.summary: The column is edited using a drop-down list control. The source of the drop-down list is a ValueList.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.EditType.MultiColumnCombo
member.summary: The column is edited using a multi column combo box control. The drop-down list is a GridEXDropDown object.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.EditType.MultiColumnDropDown
member.summary: The column is edited using a multi column drop-down list control. The drop-down list is a GridEXDropDown object.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.EditType.CheckBox
member.summary: The column is edited using a check box control.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.EditType.IntegerUpDown
member.summary: The column is edited using an up down control. Users can change the value clicking in the up and down buttons. This type can be used only to edit integer values.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.EditType.IntegerUpDownCombo
member.summary: The column is edited using an up down control. Users can type the value or change it clicking in the up and down buttons. This type can be used only to edit integer values.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.EditType.ValueListUpDown
member.summary: The column is edited using an up down control. Users can select a value from the Valuelist clicking in the up and down buttons. The source of the list is a ValueList.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.EditType.ValueListUpDownCombo
member.summary: The column is edited using an up down control. Users can type the value or select one from the Valuelist clicking in the up and down buttons. The source of the list is a ValueList.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.EditType.Custom
member.summary: The control will trigger custom edit events whenever the user tries to edit a cell in the column in order to allow you the use of any control to edit cells.

member.summary: The drop down button are drawn using Windows XP visual styles.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.FlatBorderHoverBehavior.PopUp

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ComboStyle

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ComboStyle.Combo

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ComboStyle.DropDownList

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.UpDownStyle.UpDownList

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.GridEX.FilterEditType

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.FilterEditType.NoEdit
member.summary: Read-Only. The user can not filter the column.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.FilterEditType.TextBox
member.summary: The user can type the value to filter by directly in the cell.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.FilterEditType.SameAsEditType
member.summary: The user can edit a filter row cell as it does in a regular cell.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.FilterEditType.Combo
member.summary: The user can type the value to filter by or it can choose one of the values present in the column from a drop-down list.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.FilterEditType.DropDownList
member.summary: The user can choose one of the values present in the column from a drop-down list to filter the grid by it.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.FilterEditType.CalendarCombo
member.summary: The user can edit the filter row cell using a calendar combo.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.FilterEditType.CalendarDropDown
member.summary: The user can edit the filter row cell using a calendar dropdown.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.FilterEditType.CheckBox
member.summary: The user can edit the filter row cell using a checkbox.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.FilterEditType.Custom
member.summary: The user can edit the filter row cell using a custom control.

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.GridEX.SortOrder

member.summary: Applies to GridEXColumns. The column is not sorted.

member.summary: The object is sorted in ascending order.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.SortOrder.Descending

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.GridEX.CellLayoutMode
member.summary: Specifies whether column sets or plain columns should be used to render a row.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.CellLayoutMode.UseColumns
member.summary: Cells in a row are rendered using a single level of cells.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.CellLayoutMode.UseColumnSets
member.summary: Cells in a row are rendered based on the layout of each GridEXColumnSet in the table.

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.GridEX.HideSelection
member.summary: Specifies how selected items will be displayed when the GridEX control loses focus.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.HideSelection.HideSelection
member.summary: The selected row(s) in an inactive control will be displayed as not selected, except for a frame around the row.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.HideSelection.HighlightInactive
member.summary: The selected row(s) in an inactive control will be displayed using the SelectedInactiveFormatStyle settings.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.HideSelection.Highlight
member.summary: The selected row(s) in an inactive control will be displayed using the SelectedFormatStyle settings as when it is active.

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.GridEX.AlphaMode
member.summary: Specifies which transparency style to use.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.AlphaMode.Empty
member.summary: Undefined. The value of the property will be inherited from the parent GridEXFormatStyle object or from the control's default if the parent is undefined too.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.AlphaMode.Opaque
member.summary: The area affected by this setting will be drawn opaque.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.AlphaMode.Transparent
member.summary: The area affected by this setting will be drawn transparent.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.AlphaMode.UseAlpha
member.summary: The area affected by this setting will be drawn using the AlphaLevel property value.

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.GridEX.Appearance
member.summary: Specifies the 3D appearance of an area in a GridEX control.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.Appearance.Empty
member.summary: Undefined. The value of the property will be inherited from the parent GridEXFormatStyle object.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.Appearance.Flat
member.summary: Areas are drawn flat. No 3D effect.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.Appearance.Sunken
member.summary: Areas are drawn with a double 3D sunken border.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.Appearance.SunkenLight
member.summary: Areas are drawn with a single 3D sunken border.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.Appearance.Raised
member.summary: Areas are drawn with a double 3D raised border.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.Appearance.RaisedLight
member.summary: Areas are drawn with a single 3D raised border.

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ImageHorizontalAlignment
member.summary: Specifies the horizontal alignment of an image in a GridEXFormatStyle object

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ImageHorizontalAlignment.Empty
member.summary: Undefined. The value of the property will be inherited from the parent GridEXFormatStyle object.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ImageHorizontalAlignment.Center
member.summary: Image is drawn at the center of a cell.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ImageHorizontalAlignment.Near
member.summary: Image is drawn at the left of a cell (the image will be drawn at the right if the RightToLeft property of the control is Yes).

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ImageHorizontalAlignment.Far
member.summary: Image is drawn at the right of a cell (the image will be drawn at the left if the RightToLeft property of the control is Yes).

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ImageHorizontalAlignment.BeforeText
member.summary: Text is drawn after the image.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ImageHorizontalAlignment.AfterText
member.summary: Image is drawn after the Text.

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ImageVerticalAlignment
member.summary: Specifies the vertical alignment of an image in a GridEXFormatStyle object

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ImageVerticalAlignment.Empty
member.summary: Undefined. The value of the property will be inherited from the parent GridEXFormatStyle object.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ImageVerticalAlignment.Center
member.summary: Image is drawn centered vertically in a cell.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ImageVerticalAlignment.Near
member.summary: Image is drawn at the top of a cell.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ImageVerticalAlignment.Far
member.summary: Image is drawn at the bottom of a cell.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ImageVerticalAlignment.TopOfText
member.summary: Text is drawn below the image.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ImageVerticalAlignment.BottomOfText
member.summary: Image is drawn below the text.

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.GridEX.BackgroundImageDrawMode
member.summary: Specifies how the back ground image is drawn.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.BackgroundImageDrawMode.Empty
member.summary: Undefined. The value of the property will be inherited from the parent GridEXFormatStyle object.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.BackgroundImageDrawMode.None
member.summary: The background image is not painted. The background is solid.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.BackgroundImageDrawMode.Tile
member.summary: The image is painted as tiles in a floor to cover the area.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.BackgroundImageDrawMode.Center
member.summary: The image is displayed in the center if the area is larger than the image. If the image is larger than the area, the image is placed in the center of the area and the outside edges are clipped.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.BackgroundImageDrawMode.Stretch
member.summary: The image is stretched or shrunk to fit the size of the area.

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.GridEX.TriState
member.summary: Represents a boolean value for a property that can inherit its value from a base or parent object.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.TriState.Empty
member.summary: Indicates that the value for this property should be inherited from the parent object.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.TriState.False
member.summary: Specifies that False should be used in a property ignoring settings in the parent object.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.TriState.True
member.summary: Specifies that True should be used in a property ignoring settings in the parent object.

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.GridEX.BorderStyle

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.BorderStyle.None
member.summary: The control has no border.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.BorderStyle.Flat

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.BorderStyle.RaisedLight3D
member.summary: The border has a raised outer edge and no inner edge.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.BorderStyle.Raised

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.BorderStyle.SunkenLight3D
member.summary: The border has a sunken outer edge and no inner edge.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.BorderStyle.Sunken
member.summary: The border has sunken inner and outer edges.

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ScrollBars
member.summary: Specifies which scroll bars will be visible on a control.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ScrollBars.None
member.summary: No scroll bars are shown.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ScrollBars.Automatic
member.summary: Scroll bars are shown only when needed.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ScrollBars.Vertical
member.summary: Only vertical scroll bar is visible.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ScrollBars.Horizontal
member.summary: Only horizontal scroll bar is visible.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ScrollBars.Both
member.summary: Both scroll bars are visible always.

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ButtonAppearance
member.summary: Specifies the 3D appearance of buttons and scroll bars.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ButtonAppearance.Regular
member.summary: The border of a button has raised inner and outer edges.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ButtonAppearance.Light3D
member.summary: The border of a button has a raised inner edge and no outer edge.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ButtonAppearance.Flat
member.summary: The border of a button has no 3D effects.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ButtonAppearance.FlatBorderless
member.summary: The button has no border.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ButtonAppearance.PopUp
member.summary: The button appears flat until the mouse pointer moves over it, at which point it appears with a light 3D effect.

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.GridEX.View
member.summary: Specifies how records are displayed in a GridEX control.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.View.TableView
member.summary: The records are displayed as a table where each row represents a record.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.View.CardView
member.summary: The records are displayed as cards where each card represents a record and each row in the card represents a column.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.View.SingleCard
member.summary: The records are displayed as cards where each card represents a record and each row in the card represents a column. Only one card can be seen at a time.

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.GridEX.GridLines
member.summary: Specifies how the GridEX control will draw lines between cells.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.GridLines.Default
member.summary: Unspecified. The value of the property will be inherited from the parent object.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.GridLines.None
member.summary: No lines are drawn in-between cells.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.GridLines.Vertical
member.summary: Only vertical lines are drawn in-between cells.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.GridLines.Horizontal
member.summary: Only horizontal lines are drawn in-between cells.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.GridLines.Both
member.summary: Vertical and horizontal lines are drawn in-between cells.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.GridLines.RowOutline
member.summary: Vertical and horizontal lines are drawn around the row.

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.GridEX.CardViewGridlines
member.summary: Specifies how the GridEX control will draw lines between fields in card view.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.CardViewGridlines.None
member.summary: No lines are drawn inside a card.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.CardViewGridlines.Vertical
member.summary: Only vertical lines are drawn between card column headers and card fields.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.CardViewGridlines.Horizontal
member.summary: Only vertical lines are drawn between card fields.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.CardViewGridlines.Both
member.summary: Vertical and horizontal lines are drawn around card column headers and card fields

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.CardViewGridlines.FieldsOnly
member.summary: Vertical and horizontal lines are drawn around card fields.

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.GridEX.NewRowPosition
member.summary: Specifies the position in the table of the row the user can use to add new records.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.NewRowPosition.Default
member.summary: Unspecified. The Value of the property will be inherited from the parent object.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.NewRowPosition.TopRow
member.summary: The row for adding new records is positioned below the column headers row, separated from the other rows by a horizontal divider.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.NewRowPosition.BottomRow
member.summary: The row for adding new records is the last row in the table.

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.GridEX.TotalRowPosition
member.summary: Specifies the position of the total row in the grid.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.TotalRowPosition.BottomScrollable
member.summary: Total row appears after the last row in the grid.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.TotalRowPosition.BottomFixed
member.summary: Total row is fixed at the bottom of the grid.

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ConditionOperator
member.summary: specifies the comparison operation to perform.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ConditionOperator.Equal
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the column attached to a format or filter condition is equal to the Value1 property.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ConditionOperator.NotEqual
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the column attached to a format or filter condition is different than the Value1 property.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ConditionOperator.GreaterThan
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the column attached to a format or filter condition is greater than the Value1 property.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ConditionOperator.LessThan
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the column attached to a format or filter condition is less than the Value1 property.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ConditionOperator.GreaterThanOrEqualTo
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the column attached to a format or filter condition is greater than or equal to the Value1 property.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ConditionOperator.LessThanOrEqualTo
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the column attached to a format or filter condition is less than or equal to the Value1 property.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ConditionOperator.Between
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the column attached to a format or filter condition is greater than or equal to the Value1 property and less than or equal to Value2 property.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ConditionOperator.NotBetween
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the column attached to a format or filter condition is less than the Value1 property or greater than Value2 property.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ConditionOperator.Contains
member.summary: The condition is met when the Value1 property is a substring of the value of the column attached to a format or filter condition.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ConditionOperator.NotContains
member.summary: The condition is met when the Value1 property is not a substring of the value of the column attached to a format or filter condition.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ConditionOperator.BeginsWith
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the column attached to a format or filter condition begins with the Value1 property.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ConditionOperator.EndsWith
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the column attached to a format or filter condition ends with the Value1 property.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ConditionOperator.IsNull
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the column attached to a format or filter condition is null (Nothing) or System.DBNull.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ConditionOperator.NotIsNull
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the column attached to a format or filter condition is not null (Nothing) nor System.DBNull.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ConditionOperator.IsEmpty
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the column attached to a format or filter condition is null (Nothing) or System.DBNull or an empty string.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ConditionOperator.NotIsEmpty
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the column attached to a format or filter condition is not null (Nothing) nor System.DBNull nor an empty string.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ConditionOperator.In
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the column attached to a format or filter condition is equal to at least one of the values in a list specified in Value1 property.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ConditionOperator.NotIn
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the column attached to a format or filter condition is not equal to any of the values in a list specified in Value1 property.

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.GridEX.CellToolTip
member.summary: Specifies which tooltip is used in a cell.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.CellToolTip.Default

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.CellToolTip.NoToolTip

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.CellToolTip.UseHeaderToolTip
member.summary: The value of the HeaderToolTip property is presented in the tool tip.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.CellToolTip.TruncatedText

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.CellToolTip.FetchToolTipText
member.summary: FetchCellToolTipText event is raised to get the text to be used as tooltip for a cell.

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.GridEX.SelectionMode
member.summary: Specifies how multiple rows can be selected in a GridEX control.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.SelectionMode.SingleSelection
member.summary: Only one row can be selected.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.SelectionMode.MultipleSelectionSameTable
member.summary: Multiple rows can be selected only if those rows belong to the same table.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.SelectionMode.MultipleSelection
member.summary: Multiple rows can be selected. Selecting rows from different tables is allowed.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.SelectionMode.MultipleCellSelection
member.summary: Multiple cells can be selected.
member.remarks: MultipleCellSelection is not supported in card view or when columnsets are used in table view.

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.GridEX.CellSelectionMode
member.summary: Specifies how a GridEX control should highlight the selected cell.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.CellSelectionMode.EntireRow
member.summary: When a cell is selected, the entire row is highlighted.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.CellSelectionMode.SingleCell
member.summary: When a cell is selected, a focus rectangle is used to highlight the selection.

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.GridEX.TextAlignment
member.summary: Specifies the alignment of a text string relative to its area.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.TextAlignment.Empty
member.summary: Undefined. The value of the property will be inherited from the parent object.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.TextAlignment.Near
member.summary: Text is aligned near. In left-to-right, the near position is left. In right-to-left, the near position is right.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.TextAlignment.Center
member.summary: Text is centered.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.TextAlignment.Far
member.summary: Text is aligned far. In left-to-right, the far position is right. In right-to-left, the far position is left.

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.GridEX.AggregateFunction
member.summary: Specifies the aggregate function to apply in a column. The value this function returns is displayed in the total row.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.AggregateFunction.None
member.summary: No function is applied. The total row displays an empty cell under the column.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.AggregateFunction.Count
member.summary: Total row cells display the count of records in a group or table.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.AggregateFunction.Sum
member.summary: Total row cells display the sum of the values.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.AggregateFunction.Average
member.summary: Total row cells display the average of the values.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.AggregateFunction.Min
member.summary: Total row cells display the minimum value.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.AggregateFunction.Max
member.summary: Total row cells display the maximum value.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.AggregateFunction.StdDeviation
member.summary: Total row cells display the standard deviation of the values.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.AggregateFunction.ValueCount
member.summary: Total row cells display the count of records with non-null values.

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.GridEX.GroupTotals
member.summary: Specifies how group total rows are displayed in a grouped grid.

member.summary: Group total rows are displayed always, even if the group is collapsed.

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.GridEX.FormatMode
member.summary: Specifies how a value will be formatted for display.

member.summary: The value is formatted using IFormattable interface in a column or using the FormatMode specified in the parent column when groupping values.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.FormatMode.UseIFormattable
member.summary: The value is formatted using ToString method in IFormattable interface.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.FormatMode.UseStringFormat
member.summary: The Value is formatted using the Format property of the System.String object.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.FormatMode.UseInputMask
member.summary: The value is formatted using InputMask property. This option is valid only for string types.

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ColumnSetNavigation
member.summary: Specifies how cell navigation is done in a row with column sets.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ColumnSetNavigation.Row
member.summary: When moving to the next cell, the cell in the same level of the active cell is selected. When the active cell is the last cell in a level, the first cell in the next level is selected.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ColumnSetNavigation.ColumnSet
member.summary: When moving to the next cell, the cell in the same level and the same column set of the active cell is selected. When the active cell is the last cell in a column set, the first cell in the next column set is selected.

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.GridEX.FilterMode
member.summary: Specifies how filtering, using the filter row, is done.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.FilterMode.None
member.summary: Filter row is not displayed. User can not filter records.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.FilterMode.Manual
member.summary: Filter row is displayed to let the user to enter filter criteria. The developer is responsible for filtering the data according the criteria the user entered.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.FilterMode.Automatic
member.summary: Filter row is displayed to let the user to enter filter criteria. The control filters the data automatically using GridEXFilterCondition objects.

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.GridEX.LogicalOperator
member.summary: Specifies the logical operator to use in a condition.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.LogicalOperator.None
member.summary: Indicates that the condition is a simple condition or the root condition in a composite filter condition.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.LogicalOperator.And
member.summary: Indicates that the condition must be evaluated using "And" as the logical conjunction operator with the previous condition in the collection.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.LogicalOperator.Or
member.summary: Indicates that the condition must be evaluated using "Or" as the logical conjunction operator with the previous condition in the collection.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.LogicalOperator.Xor
member.summary: Indicates that the condition must be evaluated using Xor as the logical conjuntion operator with the previous condition in the collection.

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.GridEX.IncrementalSearchMode
member.summary: Specifies how the control will search records when the user types in a GridEX control

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.IncrementalSearchMode.None
member.summary: Indicates that control won't search records when the user types a character in it.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.IncrementalSearchMode.FirstCharacter
member.summary: Indicates that the control must search the first record that starts with the character typed by the user

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.IncrementalSearchMode.AllCharacters
member.summary: Indicates that the control must search records that start with all the characters typed by the user.

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.GridEX.UpdateMode
member.summary: Specifies when the control will update the data source.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.UpdateMode.RowUpdate
member.summary: Indicates that the control will update all the changes in one row at once when the user moves to another row or presses enter

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.UpdateMode.CellUpdate
member.summary: Indicates that the control will update the data source immediately after a cell is updated.

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.GridEX.InvalidValueAction
member.summary: Determines the behavior of the control when an invalid value has been entered by the user in a cell.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.InvalidValueAction.Default
member.summary: Undefined. The value of the property will be inherited from the parent GridEX object.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.InvalidValueAction.DiscardChanges
member.summary: Indicates that the control will discard the value entered by the user in a cell if an error occurs when updating the cell.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.InvalidValueAction.DiscardChangesAndShowErrorMessage
member.summary: Indicates that the control will discard the value entered by the user in a cell if an error occurs when updating the cell. A message appears showing the error.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.InvalidValueAction.Continue
member.summary: Indicates that the control will keep the value entered by the user in a cell if an error occurs when updating the cell.This option can be used only when UpdateMode is UpdateMode.RowUpdate in the control.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.InvalidValueAction.ContinueAndShowErrorMessage
member.summary: Indicates that the control will keep the value entered by the user in a cell if an error occurs when updating the cell. A message appears showing the error. This option can be used only when UpdateMode is UpdateMode.RowUpdate in the control.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.InvalidValueAction.CancelUpdate
member.summary: Indicates that the control will halt the edition in a cell if an error occurs when the updating the cell.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.InvalidValueAction.CancelUpdateAndShowErrorMessage
member.summary: Indicates that the control will halt the edition in a cell if an error occurs when the updating the cell. A message appears showing the error.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.GroupRowVisualStyle.Standard
member.summary: Group rows are drawn using FormatStyle settings and with a standard height.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.GroupRowVisualStyle.Outlook2003
member.summary: Group rows are drawn as in Outlook 2003 with a thick line at the bottom of the row and no group indents in the child rows.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.GroupRowVisualStyle.UseRowStyle
member.summary: Group rows are drawn using the same format style a data row uses.

member.summary: The control is drawn using the built-in 'Blue' color scheme.

member.summary: Represents the index of a text used by GridEX control.

member.summary: Index of the text used in the "Group By Box" when it is empty.

member.summary: Index of the text used in the 'Today' button of the calendar dropdown.

member.summary: Index of the text displayed in the record navigator. | symbol is used as separator.

member.summary: Index of the text displayed as message box when the user enters a non existing row number in the RecordNavigator.

member.summary: Index of the text displayed in a grid when the control has no rows.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.GridEXBuiltInText.OutlookDateEmpty
member.summary: Index of text for group row 'None' when GroupInterval.OutlookDates is used. 'None' group contains rows where the date value is empty.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.GridEXBuiltInText.OutlookDateOlder
member.summary: Index of text for group row 'Older' when GroupInterval.OutlookDates is used. 'Older' group contains rows where the date value is less than the first day in the last month.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.GridEXBuiltInText.OutlookDateLastMonth
member.summary: Index of text for group row 'Last Month' when GroupInterval.OutlookDates is used. 'Last Month' group contains rows where the date value is in the previous month.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.GridEXBuiltInText.OutlookDateEarlierThisMonth
member.summary: Index of text for group row 'Earlier This Month' when GroupInterval.OutlookDates is used. 'Earlier This Month' group contains rows where the date value is in the current month and older than three weeks.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.GridEXBuiltInText.OutlookDateThreeWeeksAgo
member.summary: Index of text for group row 'Three Weeks Ago' when GroupInterval.OutlookDates is used. 'Three Weeks Ago' group contains rows where the date value is three weeks older than current date in the system.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.GridEXBuiltInText.OutlookDateTwoWeeksAgo
member.summary: Index of text for group row 'Two Weeks Ago' when GroupInterval.OutlookDates is used. 'Two Weeks Ago' group contains rows where the date value is two weeks older than current date in the system.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.GridEXBuiltInText.OutlookDateLastWeek
member.summary: Index of text for group row 'Last Week' when GroupInterval.OutlookDates is used. 'Last Week' group contains rows where the date value is one week older than current date in the system.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.GridEXBuiltInText.OutlookDateYesterday
member.summary: Index of text for group row 'Yesterday' when GroupInterval.OutlookDates is used. 'Yesterday' group contains rows where the date value is one day older than the current date in the system.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.GridEXBuiltInText.OutlookDateToday
member.summary: Index of text for group row 'Today' when GroupInterval.OutlookDates is used. 'Today' group contains rows where the date value is equal to the current date in the system.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.GridEXBuiltInText.OutlookDateTomorrow
member.summary: Index of text for group row 'Tomorrow' when GroupInterval.OutlookDates is used. 'Tomorrow' group contains rows where the date value is one day after the current date in the system.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.GridEXBuiltInText.OutlookDateNextWeek
member.summary: Index of text for group row 'Next Week' when GroupInterval.OutlookDates is used. 'Next Week' group contains rows where the date value is one week after the current date in the system.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.GridEXBuiltInText.OutlookDateTwoWeeksAway
member.summary: Index of text for group row 'Two Weeks Away' when GroupInterval.OutlookDates is used. 'Two Weeks Away' group contains rows where the date value is two weeks after the current date in the system.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.GridEXBuiltInText.OutlookDateThreeWeeksAway
member.summary: Index of text for group row 'Three Weeks Away' when GroupInterval.OutlookDates is used. 'Three Weeks Away' group contains rows where the date value is three weeks after the current date in the system.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.GridEXBuiltInText.OutlookDateLaterThisMonth
member.summary: Index of text for group row 'Later This Month' when GroupInterval.OutlookDates is used. 'Later This Month' group contains rows where the date value is in the current month and more than three weeks away.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.GridEXBuiltInText.OutlookDateNextMonth
member.summary: Index of text for group row 'Next Month' when GroupInterval.OutlookDates is used. 'Next Month' group contains rows where the date value is in the next month.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.GridEXBuiltInText.OutlookDateBeyondNextMonth
member.summary: Index of text for group row 'Beyond Next Month' when GroupInterval.OutlookDates is used. 'Beyond Next Month' group contains rows where the date value is greater than the last day in the next month.

member.summary: Checkboxes are vertically aligned in the middle, and horizontally aligned on the right.

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.GridEX.HierarchicalGroupMode
member.summary: Specifies how self referencing rows are grouped in the table.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.HierarchicalGroupMode.ParentRows
member.summary: Only parent rows are grouped. Row hierarchy remains intact.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.HierarchicalGroupMode.AllRows
member.summary: All rows are grouped. Row hierarchy is lost.

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ParentRootMode
member.summary: Specifies how first level rows are calculated in a self referencing table

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ParentRootMode.NullValue
member.summary: Rows with null or DBNull as value in its ChildMember property, are treated as first level rows.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ParentRootMode.SelfReferencingNode
member.summary: Rows where its ChildMember property returns the same value as its ParentMember property, are treated as first level rows.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.ParentRootMode.UseParentRootValue
member.summary: Rows where its ChildMember property returns a value equal to the value specified in the ParentRootValue property.

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.GridEX.HierarchicalMode
member.summary: Specifies the kind of hierarchy to use in child rows of a GridEXTable.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.HierarchicalMode.UseChildTables
member.summary: Tables defined in the ChildTables property are used to calculate child rows of a table.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.HierarchicalMode.SelfReferencing
member.summary: Self referencing hierarchy constructed by the GridEXTable where, parent rows are calculated using ParentRootMode and ParentRootValue properties and child rows are the ones where the ChildMember property is equal to the ParentMember value of a row.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.HierarchicalMode.SelfReferencingChildList
member.summary: Self referencing hierarchy. Child rows are retrieved from the list returned by the property specified in the ChildListMember property.

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.GridEX.HeaderOrder

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.HeaderOrder.Position
member.summary: Headers are ordered based on its position in the grid.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.HeaderOrder.Alphabetical
member.summary: Headers are ordered based on its caption.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.HeaderOrder.Index
member.summary: Headers are ordered based on its index.

member.summary: Specifies how rows are checked in a hierarchical or self referencing grid.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.RowCheckStateBehavior.CheckIndividualRows
member.summary: Rows are checked as individual rows, checking a parent row does not check its child rows.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.GridEX.RowCheckStateBehavior.CheckStateDependsOnChild
member.summary: When a parent row is checked, all its child rows are checked too. In the same way, when all child rows of a parent are checked, its parent is checked automatically.
